function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for wearables due to COVID-19","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases if wearables are not effectively utilized","Mitigation":"Implement thorough guidelines for safe usage of wearables and provide education on proper usage","Technologies":"IoT, data analytics, wearable technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Acceleration of IoT adoption in healthcare sector due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential security and privacy risks associated with IoT devices in healthcare","Mitigation":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures and privacy protocols for IoT devices, conduct regular security audits","Technologies":"IoT, cybersecurity, data encryption","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, cybersecurity firms"},{"Description":"Increased use of wearable devices for tracking and contact tracing during COVID-19","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce strict privacy regulations, obtain explicit consent for data collection and usage","Technologies":"Wearable technology, data encryption, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"General public, data collection companies","Owner":"Government regulatory bodies, technology companies"}]}
